channel.title: Compiler Help for Vista
channel.description: basically follow any compiler guide [b]BUT[/b] simply replace things like jdk1_0_11 with just jdk and it should work just remember to follow ticos guide on enviromental variables also this works for all compilers open compiler, press Ctrl F and search jdk and make sure all the distinations you see are %ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk\bin\javac.exe and all your problems will be solved[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 04:40:34 pm[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 04:50:55 pm[/size][hr]this should work for most comps

item.title: Compiler Help for Vista
item.dc:creator: @Kenpachi_Urasai Kenpachi Urasai
item.description:
@Kenpachi_Urasai wrote:

basically follow any compiler guide BUT simply replace things like jdk1_0_11 with just jdk and it should work
just remember to follow ticos guide on enviromental variables
also this works for all compilers
open compiler, press Ctrl F and search jdk and make sure all the distinations you see are
%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk\bin\javac.exe and all your problems will be solved[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 04:40:34 pm[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 04:50:55 pm[/size][hr]this should work for most comps
